CustomField.formula: IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "MPW",'Please provide the number of push to talk only users.',"According to the inputs provided in previous tab the number of XGSPON ports needed is "+ TEXT(CEILING(ProductAttributeValueId__r.X7210_SAS_R_IMM_QTN__c/ ProductAttributeValueId__r.Q_SplitRatio__c))+". Please ensure that the sum up of XGS-PON XFPs dimensioned in this tab corresponds with this value")
CustomField.label: Guidance
